tool_description: You can use it to retrieve data from LinkedIn and integrate it into your application or platform. The API allows you to access a wide range of data, including user profiles, company profiles, job postings, and more.

api_list.name: Industries List
api_list.description: Retrieve the list of industries applicable for utilization on the search endpoint.

api_list.name: Company Types
api_list.description: Get the list of company types to use in company_type search filter.

api_list.name: Get Company Details
api_list.description: You can use this endpoint to get details for companies LinkedIn profiles.

api_list.name: Get Profile Details
api_list.description: You can use this endpoint to get details for personal LinkedIn profiles.

api_list.name: Linkedin Search
api_list.description: This endpoint will be used to search for LinkedIn profiles and data.
